departments.name: TGMREIS
departments.description: Runs residential schools and junior colleges providing free, high-quality education and holistic development for minority students.

departments.name: Telangana Minority Finance Corporation
departments.description: Provides financial assistance, subsidies, loans, and skill development support to improve economic opportunities for minorities.

departments.name: Telangana State Waqf Board
departments.description: Administers and protects Waqf properties and institutions, ensuring proper management and service delivery.

departments.name: Christian Minority Finance Corporation
departments.description: Implements welfare schemes and provides financial assistance to support the economic upliftment of Christian minorities.

departments.name: Survey Commissioner of Waqf
departments.description: Conducts statutory surveys to identify, document, and record Waqf properties across the state.

departments.name: Waqf Tribunal
departments.description: A judicial body that adjudicates disputes and legal matters related to Waqf properties and institutions.

departments.name: Telangana Haj Committee
departments.description: Provides guidance and logistical support for pilgrims from Telangana undertaking the Haj pilgrimage.

departments.name: Telangana Urdu Academy
departments.description: Promotes the Urdu language, literature, and culture through educational, literary, and cultural initiatives.

departments.name: Minorities Study Circle
departments.description: Offers free coaching and study resources for minority candidates preparing for competitive examinations.

departments.name: Centre for Education Development of Minorities
departments.description: Implements educational development programs and coaching initiatives to improve academic outcomes for minorities.

departments.name: Dairatul-Maarif-il-Osmania
departments.description: A renowned institution dedicated to the research, preservation, and publication of rare Arabic manuscripts.

departments.name: Telangana Minorities Commission
departments.description: Protects minority rights and examines complaints related to deprivation or violation of those rights.
